
One week of snow

# BITSY VERSION 4.5

NAME tea
DLG ITM_0

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_0
So much snow... Good thing I have food, they said roads will probabaly be closed for a week.

DLG SPR_1
I don't think it's good idea to leave with this weather.

DLG SPR_2
Nothing on the screen since yesterday...

DLG SPR_3
This snow globe is a gift from my parents. It weirdly looks like my house. Even the fir tree is here.

DLG SPR_4
nothing except snow, But i can still see the big fir tree in my garden.

DLG SPR_5
It's late, maybe I should go to sleep.

DLG SPR_6
Nothing on the screen since two days...

DLG SPR_7
What a weird dream, it was like I was in the snow globe.

DLG SPR_8
Still very snowy, staying here is safer.

DLG SPR_9
One day done, six to go.

DLG SPR_a
I'm awake but I don't remember leaving my bed this morning.

DLG SPR_b
Nothing change since yest...is this foot steps? Probably an animal...

DLG SPR_c
"""
{
  - a == 1 ?
    The fir tree is also broken here?What is happening?
  - else ?
    More foot steps... And the fir tree is...broken?{b = 1}
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_d
"""
{
  - b == 1 ?
    The fir tree is broken here too? How!?
  - else ?
    More foot steps. And the fir tree is broken, probably the wind and the weight of the snow.{a = 1}
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_e
3 days in a row...

DLG SPR_f
More deams...and it seems someone came hre during the last nights...And my head is so painful.

DLG SPR_g
I don't have electricity anymore...

DLG SPR_h
The roof collapsed yesterday, good thing I wasn't in my room. But where was I? I can sleep in my sleeping bag in the living room now.

DLG SPR_i
The roof collapsed here too. What is the next step?

DLG SPR_j
The door is stucked. At least, no one can come here.

DLG SPR_k
The door is locked. Maybe I can find n other way by walking around the house.

END 0


END undefined
You walked around the house few times. Every window were closed, and you didn't have the strengh to break them. You left the house and ran to find help. After few minutes, you were hit by something. It was like an invisible wall, made of glass...

VAR a
0

VAR b
0
